name: The Last Bird
description: The Last Bird is a game where you are the last surviving bird, Hank, after an alien civilization invades planet Earth, destroying most of life and reducing the cities to rubble. It is your job to guide Hank through the ruins of Earth, in order to make it to the South Pole, the last hope for life on Earth. Before you can get to the South, you must battle the invaders and kill the Alien Overlord Walker to save the last bird egg, the last of the bird species.
